entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You obtained a Force crystal from inside of the temple of Exar Kun for Luke Skywalker.
entries.journal_entry_description: Luke Skywalker wants you to retrieve a Force crystal from inside of the Temple of Exar Kun.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find and retrieve a Force crystal from inside of the Temple of Exar Kun.
entries.task00_retrieve_menu_text: Attempt to Take the Force Crystal
entries.task00_start_message: Nothing happens at first, but you get the distinct feeling that you are being watched.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Return to Luke Skywalker with the Force crystal you found in the Temple of Exar Kun.
